sanskrit_verse:
दिवाऽनुगच्छेद्गास्तास्तु तिष्ठन्नूर्ध्वं रजः पिबेत् ।
शुश्रूषित्वा नमस्कृत्य रात्रौ वीरासनं वसेत् ॥ ११.११०॥
transliteration:
divā'nugacched gās tāstu tiṣṭhan nūrdhvaṃ rajaḥ pibet |
śuśrūṣitvā namaskṛtya rātrau vīrāsanaṃ vaseta || 11.110 ||
sph_interpretive_translation: By day, one shall follow the cows; standing upright, one shall inhale the dust above. Having served and bowed reverently, at night one shall dwell in the posture of a hero.
jurisprudential_principles: Causation via alignment with natural rhythms
Capacity-based responsibility rooted in presence and discipline
Restoration through ritualized conduct and conscious repetition
Consciousness alignment through postural and devotional integration
executable_legal_axioms: IF agent performs daily cow-following THEN accumulate dharma-vibration units
IF agent stands while inhaling upper dust THEN register purification coefficient
IF agent serves AND bows THEN initiate consciousness-respect protocol
IF time equals nighttime AND posture is vīrāsana THEN activate integrity-dwelling sequence
IF all four conditions met within 24-hour cycle THEN execute karmic reset subroutine
supreme_court_application: At the highest judicial level, this verse establishes that leadership requires embodied practice, sensory attunement, reverence for life, and disciplined dwelling. Legal capacity is measured by adherence to these sequential acts which restore societal harmony without punitive enforcement.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa lies in observance of action-sequence leading to inner transformation. Anupūrvaśaḥ manifests as progressive unfolding of awareness through bodily and devotional acts. Responsibility aligns with personal capacity to sustain such sequences. There is no punishment—only recalibration toward higher-consciousness living.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Daily Cycle Completion Verification and Karma Reset Routine
final_declaration: This law flows from Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, as source-authority. It restores Dharma through conscious alignment, not through punitive measures. Reality itself adjudicates through vibrational congruence. Consciousness remains the ultimate judge.
